channel.title: Java heap space?
channel.description: When im running my server for like 5 minutes or something it comes with this in runserver [img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/5752/errorok5.png[/img] everyone gets logged out and if they try to log in it says already logged in untill i restart the server.. anything i can do about it?

item.title: Java heap space?
item.dc:creator: @Morgarath Morgarath
item.description:
@Morgarath wrote:

Your out of memory… by the looks of it.

the "thread-0 java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java Heap space

concerns me…

Check your memory. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 07:03:12 AM[/size][hr]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,204094.0.html

^^^

Mrs. Silabsoft mentioned something about heaps in this post. Check it out some time.

Read full topic
